articles.description:
🚨 AIRDROP RUMOUR 🚨
@OndoFinance is bringing treasury and corporate bonds on-chain.
They've deployed a lending platform @FluxDeFi where holders borrow against their bonds.
As a result, rates for lending stables are just below the treasury rates @ 3.75%.
useful for $ONDO? 🎈 https://t.co/UDnjjIHRGK
